title: Representation of a fluid medium.
description:
Contains relevant property values of a fluid medium.
Schema on github: https://github.com/Engineer2B/PowerCalculator-Schemas

Name.description: A unique identifier of the fluid medium.

Speed of sound.description: [m/s] The speed of sound in the medium.

Acoustic attenuation.description:
[Np/m] The attenuation of an acoustic wave in the medium.
Can also be an equation string with parameter 'T' for temperature in [K].
For further reference see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Attenuation and https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neper.

Density.description:
[kg/m^3] The amount of mass per volume.
Can also be an equation string with parameter 'T' for temperature in [K].
See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Density.

Heat absorption fraction.description: [-] The fraction of the heat that contributes to a temperature increase.

Atmospheric pressure freezing point.description: [K] The temperature at 1 atm at which the medium changes to the solid phase.
